ComicInfo.Summary:
When a husband and wife find a mysterious briefcase in the back of their car, the wife recounts a cryptic encounter that could have ended in horror. But that's only the beginning of the story in this creepy re-imagining of the urban legend "The Briefcase Killer."
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | EricJ | 1 | B | Cover B | Antonio Bifulco & Alessia Nocera | 2 | C | Cover C | Mary Laura Sanapo | 3 | D | Motor City Comic Con Exclusive Cover | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 4 | Note: The digital edition (4/27/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
